a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Prevalence of ADHD in males vs females, 2019
Share of male population, versus share of female population with attention deficit/hyperactivity disorder (ADHD).
Prevalence has been age-standardized for comparison between countries and through time.
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2019)
